name: sortie
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a short, quick attack by a military force, such as a small group of soldiers or an aircraft, made against an enemy position: A series of sorties was carried out at night by specially equipped aircraft.
a short journey to somewhere you have not been before, often with a particular purpose: It was our first sortie into the shopping centre.
an attempt to do something: This is the acclaimed historian John Taylor's first sortie into fiction.
